news.title: Novo Nordisk sues Hims & Hers over cheaper copycat versions of Wegovy pill, injections
news.summary: Novo is asking the court to permanently ban Hims from selling compounded versions of its drugs that infringe patents. Novo is seeking to recover damages.

news.title: Cuba says international airlines can no longer refuel there as Trump turns up the pressure
news.summary: The update comes shortly after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened tariffs on any country that supplies Cuba with oil. The update comes after the president said he would impose tariffs on countries that supply Cuba with crude oil.

news.title: Pressure mounts on American Airlines CEO as carrier lags rivals
news.summary: American Airlines made $111 million last year. Delta Air Lines and United Airlines, brought in $5 billion and $3.3 billion, respectively.

news.title: Epstein files: Congressional lawmakers call for Trump Commerce chief Lutnick to resign, or be fired
news.summary: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick previously said on a podcast that he had cut ties with the notorious sex offender since an initial 2005 encounter. He has since said that he has not spoken to him again.

news.title: Meta starts big week in court, with opening arguments beginning in New Mexico, LA trials
news.summary: Opening arguments begin in high-profile social media trials in New Mexico and Los Angeles. Opening arguments begin on Monday in social media trial in New New Mexico. The trial is expected to last two weeks.

news.title: Gold futures once again reclaim $5,000 mark
news.summary: Gold futures rose on Monday, as the volatile yellow metal benefited from uncertainty overseas. Gold futures rose by 0.4 per cent to $1,253 per ounce on Monday.

news.title: Hims & Hers reverses plan for oral Wegovy, and its stock tumbled 20%
news.summary: U.S. company reverses plans to introduce own version of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy oral weight-loss drug. Hims & Hers stock tumbled in early action on Monday.

news.title: STMicro shares boom on multiyear, mult-billion dollar deal with Amazon Web Services
news.summary: Amazon Web Services will receive a long-term supply of advanced semiconductor chips. In return, Amazon may acquire a stake of up to 2.7% in STMicro.

news.title: The labor market was bad last year. Will investors get stung by a poor January jobs report, too?
news.summary: Investors are on edge about the January jobs report after an anxious week on Wall Street. But the survey is likely to tell them more about the past than the future.

news.title: Krogerâ€™s stock surges as the grocer finally names a new CEO
news.summary: Kroger named Greg Foran, the former leader of Walmart U.S. as its new CEO after a nearly yearlong search.
